title: An epitaph, or rather a short discourse made vpon the life [and] death of D. Boner sometimes vnworthy Bisshop of London whiche dyed the v. of September in the Marshalsie.
author: Knell, Thomas.
publisher: At the long shop adioyning vnto S. Mildreds Church in the Pultrie by Iohn Allde,
notes: Signed at ed: T. Knell. Iu.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
